body:
## Release Notes

- Update dependencies in lock-step for API break. @iphydf (#817)
- Update to new versions with api changes. @iphydf (#808)
- Add warning suppression for protobuf C++ lite runtime. @iphydf (#801)
- Add back jvm-toxcore-c to the stack. @iphydf (#800)
- Replace junit with kotlin-test-junit for multiplatform. @iphydf (#799)
- Add kotlinx.coroutines to maven install. @iphydf (#798)
- Remove kythe; update docker/build-push-action. @iphydf (#797)
- Add "desktop" to the trifa material description. @iphydf (#785)
- Add some links to other resources to readme. @iphydf (#783)
- Add another warning suppression for libcap. @iphydf (#782)
- Add warning suppression in toxins (for toxvpn). @iphydf (#781)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#776)
- Add hs-msgpack-json to the stack. @iphydf (#769)
- Add `no-san` to the skipped targets in the msan build. @iphydf (#755)
- Add happy-arbitrary to the stack. @iphydf (#749)
- Add mypy/stubgen into toktok-stack. @iphydf (#745)
- Fix msan build. @iphydf (#744)
- Push tokstyle changes to toktok-stack. @iphydf (#743)
- Remove settings test. @iphydf (#739)
- Don't fail-fast in docker builds. @iphydf (#735)
- Move toolchain stuff to a .bzl file. @iphydf (#734)
- Update rules_zig and add zig-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#731)
- Add rules_zig; support cross-compiling `//...`. @iphydf (#717)
- Fix support for Haskell IDEs, including vscode. @iphydf (#715)
- Rework opus/vpx builds to support arm64. @iphydf (#712)
- Add cross compilation support via zig compiler. @iphydf (#711)
- Add "extra" haskell package. @iphydf (#705)
- Add apigen to stack.yaml. @iphydf (#696)
- Add apigen repo; enable kotlin in WORKSPACE. @iphydf (#694)
- Zero-init another array in libsodium. @iphydf (#684)
- Add llvm-symbolizer to third party. @iphydf (#683)
- Add back the libsodium msan patch. @iphydf (#682)
- Cleanup some compile flags; remove portaudio. @iphydf (#677)
- Correct msan build (had typo in bazel flag). @iphydf (#676)
- Enable msan build on CI (actually!). @iphydf (#675)
- Re-enable msan build. @iphydf (#674)
- Fix asan/tsan builds; re-enable them on CI. @iphydf (#673)
- Add tor to home; fix inject-repo for cirrus. @iphydf (#669)
- Migrate to arion-based docker images. @iphydf (#667)
- Make dev image work again with alpine. @iphydf (#666)
- Move back to clang in bazel builds. @iphydf (#665)
- Use nixpkgs for external dependencies. @iphydf (#664)
- Second attempt to reduce disk usage on docker image builds. @iphydf (#663)
- Attempt to reduce disk usage for building docker images. @iphydf (#661)
- Update toktok-stack to ghc 9.4.6. @iphydf (#649)
- Make Cirrus CI work again. @iphydf (#651)
- Add more strict asan options; use `action_env` instead of `test_env` @iphydf (#646)
- Update ci-tools and tokstyle; add cppcheck and libgtest-dev. @iphydf (#642)
- Remove rust support in toktok-stack. @iphydf (#640)
- Update kythe and rust rules; add support for python 3.10. @iphydf (#637)
- Update some workspace rules. @iphydf (#634)
- Fix buildtools version reference. @iphydf (#633)
- Update some repos. @iphydf (#632)
- Upgrade to bazel 6.3.2. @iphydf (#629)
- Add schedule to docker workflows; don't run codeql on push. @iphydf (#628)
- Update docker actions from v1 to v2. @iphydf (#627)
- Update master to main for gorilla websocket repo. @iphydf (#626)
- Add CodeQL workflow for GitHub code scanning @lgtm-com (#616)
- Filter out Haskell targets in the docker sandbox build. @iphydf (#100)
- Add "oomer" tool (run_oomer and library). @iphydf (#91)
- Sourcery refactored master branch @sourcery-ai (#92)
- Restyle Sourcery refactored master branch @restyled-io (#93)
- Remove checksum check. @iphydf (#90)
- Allow sub-repos to bring their own .bazelrc.local. @iphydf (#89)
- Enable bazel strict mode by default. @iphydf (#87)
- Add support for YouCompleteMe in vim built with Python 2. @iphydf (#86)
- Make .bazelrc.local.example useful for 12 core machines. @iphydf (#84)
- Add `make build-kythe` command to update the Kythe serving image. @iphydf (#80)
- Fix linking toxic against libpython 3.8. @iphydf (#78)
- Stop using stropts.h. It disappeared in ubuntu focal. @iphydf (#77)
- Add test to make sure all project lists agree. @iphydf (#71)
- Fix .bazelrc so it works in all directories, not just //. @iphydf (#70)
- Make sure we have the right repo name in settings.yml. @iphydf (#66)
- Add back the "bazel" tag for toktok-stack. @iphydf (#65)
- Add settings.yml to manage some of the github settings. @iphydf (#64)
- Add CODEOWNERS file for /.github/. @iphydf (#63)
- Update submodules for the next toktok-stack snapshot. @iphydf (#61)
- Get toktok-stack ready for using remote build execution. @iphydf (#58)
- Add more tests to the cirrus-ci build. @iphydf (#60)
- Add "ci" config value to .bazelrc. @iphydf (#59)
- Use exec_tools and cfg = "exec" for genrules/rules. @iphydf (#55)
- Add qt_win_deploy Skylark macro. @iphydf (#56)
- Add "experimental" directory. @iphydf (#57)
- Enable running tests on Travis. @iphydf (#54)
- Upgrade bazel to version 3.0.0. @iphydf (#53)
- Fix OSX build now that we no longer build our own openssl. @iphydf (#52)
- Fix build of @ffmpeg//:bin/ffplay on osx. @iphydf (#51)
- Add support for FreeBSD to build qTox. @iphydf (#50)
- Port bazel rules for ffmpeg and libexif to windows. @iphydf (#49)
- Simplify qTox build by autodetecting library locations. @iphydf (#48)
- Update X11 dependencies. @iphydf (#47)
- Add support for native Windows builds with MSVC. @iphydf (#46)
- Make OSX build of qTox work. @iphydf (#45)
- Update repos to their latest master. @iphydf (#44)
- Upgrade bazel to 2.2.0. @iphydf (#43)
- Upgrade bazel version to 0.22. @iphydf (#42)
- Upgrade bazel to 0.19.0. @iphydf (#41)
- Move git tools out of toktok-stack into hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#40)
- Enable yamllint for all repositories. @iphydf (#39)
- Preliminary win32 support: pthreads. @iphydf (#38)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#37)
- Use strict rule execution environments. @iphydf (#36)
- Upgrade to latest version of bazel-toolchains. @iphydf (#35)
- Use most recent version of Bazel (0.17.1). @iphydf (#34)
- Add support for docker-sandbox builds and use it on Travis. @iphydf (#33)
- Use hazel to manage Haskell package versions. @iphydf (#32)
- add x264 local repository @zoff99 (#27)
- Upgrade dependencies in bazel build. @iphydf (#25)
- Use boringssl instead of openssl for toxic. @iphydf (#24)
- Add lens-family haskell package (dependency for hstox). @iphydf (#23)
- Add bzip2 binary and test program. @iphydf (#22)
- List yarn dependencies explicitly; enable trace on toxcore. @iphydf (#21)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#20)
- Add cedar to the toktok stack. @iphydf (#19)
- Add haskell testing libraries to bazel build. @iphydf (#18)
- Add missing haskell packages for hs-msgpack-rpc to build. @iphydf (#17)
- Upgrade libvpx to version 1.7.0. @iphydf (#16)
- Preliminary OSX support in toktok-stack. @iphydf (#15)
- Build yasm as a tool in the build. @iphydf (#14)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#13)
- Add travis local caching. @iphydf (#12)
- Disable remote cache; add @haskell_old_time. @iphydf (#11)
- Build the entire toktok-stack on travis. @iphydf (#10)
- Add support for moc-compiling .cpp files. @iphydf (#8)
- Build qtox on travis and import go-toxcore. @iphydf (#7)
- Enable bazel and clang colour output on travis. @iphydf (#6)
- Add support for Qt resources; make stack not executable. @iphydf (#5)
- Move toktok-stack to bazel build. @iphydf (#4)

## Features

- Add libfuzzer support in bazel. @iphydf (#450)
- Add `--config=mallocfail` and fix run_mallocfail. @iphydf (#393)
- Add `--config=flakynet` to run tests with simulated bad network. @iphydf (#391)
- Add heroku API to the dev image. @iphydf (#374)
- Add more vim plugins for Haskell development. @iphydf (#349)
- Make GHC with bazel work in vscode. @iphydf (#345)
- Install manpages in dev container. @iphydf (#344)
- Add dev container docker build. @iphydf (#322)
- Add valgrind config for bazel. @iphydf (#290)
- Add a `retry` script to run a command multiple times. @iphydf (#287)
- Build both release and debug docker images. @iphydf (#252)
- Add flakynet, a UDP packet loss testing library. @iphydf (#118)
- Add msgpack-c to third_party. @iphydf (#98)

## Performance improvements

- Use docker buildx for kythe table image builds. @iphydf (#399)

## Bug Fixes

- Use a local checkout for the buildx context in kythe build. @iphydf (#407)
- Install a default .bazelrc.local on init. @iphydf (#338)
- Update sodium_config.h for 1.0.18. @iphydf (#295)
- Support `package` in haskell packages. @iphydf (#283)
- Update ycm script to the latest kythe changes. @iphydf (#234)
- Allow builder user to add/remove files in /src/workspace. @iphydf (#199)

## Documentation

- Add usage docs for dev containers. @iphydf (#334)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Fix dependency errors @nurupo (#835)
- Add honggfuzz bazel config. @iphydf (#488)
- Add toxext stuff to third_party. @iphydf (#476)
- Set compilation mode to debug in sanitizers. @iphydf (#468)
- Add cmp to the git-remotes script. @iphydf (#458)
- Fix the `-UNDEBUG` flag. @iphydf (#456)
- Don't strip debug info in fuzzer builds. @iphydf (#454)
- Unset `-DNO_FRAME_POINTER` on absl compilation. @iphydf (#452)
- Add toktok-fuzzer to the stack. @iphydf (#451)
- Enable optimisation flags in sanitizer builds. @iphydf (#444)
- Don't warn about unused variables in ncurses. @iphydf (#440)
- Add ncurses to the bazel build. @iphydf (#439)
- Update happy parser templates. @iphydf (#426)
- Upgrade the stackage LTS version for bazel builds. @iphydf (#425)
- Add brick (and dependencies) to third_party. @iphydf (#420)
- Add wchar ncurses support. @iphydf (#417)
- Slightly better haskell indent settings in vim. @iphydf (#395)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#388)
- Update hs-msgpack-types. @iphydf (#387)
- Update msgpack-arbitrary. @iphydf (#386)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#385)
- Run stack build before PR merge. @iphydf (#384)
- Add msgpack-arbitrary to the stack. @iphydf (#383)
- Create empty `$HOME/.local/bin` directory. @iphydf (#382)
- Add msgpack-testsuite in all the missing places. @iphydf (#381)
- Add msgpack-testsuite to the stack. @iphydf (#380)
- Add missing hs-msgpack-persist to dockerfile. @iphydf (#377)
- Add hs-msgpack-persist to the stack. @iphydf (#376)
- Enable tests on haskell stack builds. @iphydf (#375)
- Update submodules; add websocket go dependency. @iphydf (#373)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#372)
- Add monad-validate to dependencies. @iphydf (#371)
- Upgrade ghc to 8.10.7 and stack to 18.18. @iphydf (#369)
- Add additional haskell deps. @iphydf (#367)
- Publish all haskell projects to a docker image. @iphydf (#365)
- Update cimple again. @iphydf (#361)
- Update cimple. @iphydf (#359)
- Update cimple to get support for more msgpack types. @iphydf (#358)
- Update cimple so msgpack types are supported. @iphydf (#355)
- Update msgpack-c to 4.0.0. @iphydf (#353)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#352)
- Update hs-cimple so doxygen is supported. @iphydf (#351)
- Add btox to the stack. @iphydf (#339)
- Move entrypoint to -dev image. @iphydf (#333)
- Remove explicit checkout in buildx actions. @iphydf (#332)
- Split docker build in `latest-third_party` and `latest`. @iphydf (#330)
- Rename bazel build to "opt" in cirrus. @iphydf (#327)
- Disable deprecated-declarations warning in cython code. @iphydf (#326)
- Fix dev container build; add example usage. @iphydf (#323)
- Use commit message in addition to PR title for skipping pull. @iphydf (#321)
- Move the toolchain out of workspace. @iphydf (#319)
- Increase flaky test retries. @iphydf (#310)
- Update toxcore and tokstyle submodules. @iphydf (#308)
- Add cython to the dependencies. @iphydf (#305)
- Disable `--remote_download_minimal` again. @iphydf (#304)
- Give builder user passwordless sudo. @iphydf (#297)
- Add patches for libsodium and opus to pass msan. @iphydf (#293)
- Return failure exit status if all retries fail. @iphydf (#289)
- Fix asan build. @iphydf (#286)
- Fix docker login on debug/asan/tsan/msan builds. @iphydf (#284)
- Fix remote cache usage. @iphydf (#279)
- Move Qt deps installation out of the toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#278)
- Enable layering check on third party build files. @iphydf (#276)
- Use our own toolchain instead of the google one. @iphydf (#275)
- Build kythe tables on pull requests and push. @iphydf (#272)
- Use clang-12 for toktok-stack builds. @iphydf (#269)
- Add edit-distance haskell package. @iphydf (#262)
- Update tokstyle in the stack. @iphydf (#259)
- Update haskell github workflows. @iphydf (#254)
- Remove debug build again. @iphydf (#253)
- Add servant, wai, warp, etc. for web services. @iphydf (#249)
- Add recursion-schemes to third_party haskell. @iphydf (#247)
- Update toktok-stack version and submodules. @iphydf (#240)
- Remove NDK from the docker image. @iphydf (#230)
- Update submodule versions. @iphydf (#229)
- Increment toktok-stack version number. @iphydf (#218)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#210)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#206)
- Update submodules. @iphydf (#205)
- Add buildifier lint check for BUILD files. @iphydf (#202)
- Update all submodules to the latest git version. @iphydf (#201)
- Update toktok-stack image version. @iphydf (#200)
- Fix docker build (it was missing the git checkout). @iphydf (#198)
- Upgrade ffmpeg 4.2.2 -> 4.4.1. @iphydf (#196)
- Upgrade haskell to ghc-8.10.3. @iphydf (#194)
- Add toxic to the toktok-stack cirrus build. @iphydf (#193)
- Update to bazel 4.2.1; remove Travis. @iphydf (#191)
- Use bazel-3.3.1 on cirrus-ci. @iphydf (#175)
- Remove cedar and js-bugz; fix compat with bazel 3.7.2. @iphydf (#174)
- Add missing linker option to link openal to libdl. @iphydf (#129)
- Fix name of "upstream" remote for jtox. @iphydf (#111)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- [ImgBot] Optimize images @imgbot (#336)
- Remove toktok-android. @iphydf (#337)
- Remove ycm script. @iphydf (#328)
- Add mypy type checking to python scripts. @iphydf (#301)
